extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Devices and Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the device is running a vulnerable version of iOS, iPadOS, macOS, or watchOS.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the device running a vulnerable version?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Latest OS Version
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the device to the latest OS version to fix the vulnerabilities CVE-2023-42824 and CVE-2023-5217. For iOS and iPadOS, upgrade to 17.0.3; for macOS, upgrade to Ventura 13.6; for watchOS, upgrade to 10.0.1.

affected_products: Macs running macOS Monterey and newer
